title: Amulet of glory (t)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The amulet of glory (t) (or trimmed amulet of glory) is a cosmetic variant of the regular amulet of glory. Players can receive this item as a reward from hard Treasure Trails at a chance of 1/1,625 per slot. Aside from appearance, it has the same functions and stat bonuses as a regular amulet of glory.

SMW Subobject for UnchargedHigh Alchemy value: 10575Buy limit: 5Examine: A very powerful dragonstone amulet.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Amulet of glory (t)Image: File:Amulet of glory (t) (uncharged).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.010Value: 17625Version anchor: UnchargedRelease date: 5 December 2006Item ID: 10362

The amulet of glory (t) (or trimmed amulet of glory) is a cosmetic variant of the regular amulet of glory. Players can receive this item as a reward from hard Treasure Trails at a chance of 1/1,625 per slot. Aside from appearance, it has the same functions and stat bonuses as a regular amulet of glory.

This item can be stored in the treasure chest of a costume room. However, unlike its regular counterpart, it cannot be mounted in a Quest Hall.

For Ironmen completing treasure trails, this can NOT be used as an uncharged amulet of glory - only a regular amulet of glory may be used, obtained either through crafting one at level 80, or by completing other treasure trails.

Heroes' Quest is required to charge the amulet at the Fountain of Rune. Like the regular amulet of glory, there is a 1 in 25,000 chance that it will transmute into an amulet of eternal glory when charged at the Fountain of Rune, causing it to provide unlimited teleports rather than the usual six. This will cause it to lose its trimmed status.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 August 2017
(update)

Partially charged versions of the item could now be turned into bank placeholders.

9 February 2017
(update)

The uncharged version was made darker to distinguish it from charged versions.

5 March 2015
(update)

The item was made tradeable again on the Grand Exchange.

26 February 2015
(update)

The item was made untradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.

10 December 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Amulet of glory(t)" to "Amulet of glory (t)".

Players can receive this item as a reward from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]] at a chance of 1/1,625 per slot. For Ironmen completing treasure trails, this can '''NOT''' be used as an uncharged amulet of glory - only a regular amulet of glory may be used, obtained either through crafting one at level 80, or by completing other treasure trails. [[Heroes' Quest]] is required to charge the amulet at the [[Fountain of Rune]]. Like the regular amulet of glory, there is a 1 in 25,000 chance that it will transmute into an [[amulet of eternal glory]] when charged at the Fountain of Rune, causing it to provide unlimited teleports rather than the usual six.
